remarks: Hilbert vector space commutative/associative law.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-1999.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hvass.1 $e |- A e. ~H $.
hvass.2 $e |- B e. ~H $.
hvass.3 $e |- C e. ~H $.
hvsub32i $p |- ( ( A -h B ) -h C ) = ( ( A -h C ) -h B ) $.
